item.title: Valuing NFL Draft Picks
item.description: Originally published on the Brown Sports Analytics blog, back when I was a student. Amended below for clarity / brevity. In March 2017, the Cleveland Browns acquired the maligned Brock Osweiler from the Texans. Osweiler was coming off a disappointing season with the Texans, and had just signed a massive 4 year, 72 million dollar contract the year before. Osweiler was released from the Browns less than six months later, never having played a snap.
